column5: This is what I've been hoping for. Tight Lines SBK http://lhfcschoolhatcheries.blogspot.ca/2015/11/lhfc-school-salmon-hatchery-partners.html
cool!  I want one in my living room!
Once again Richard, great job, take a bow. Kids are going to have a blast Im sure,
Lots of people would like one in there living room but that's not going to happen lol. Thanx & Tight Lines SBK
Richard, you always do a fantastic job! Everyone involved with your program has nothing but high praises for the work you do.  I for one always look forward to seeing your updates!  Thanks as always!
